title: Bela Lugosi Movie Marathon (10 horror movies)

sources.title: Bela Lugosi Movie Marathon (10 horror movies)
sources.description:
Bela Lugosi was the dark prince of early Hollywood, captivating audiences with his chilling charisma, hypnotic stare, and unmistakable voice. A master of the macabre, Lugosi brought an eerie intensity to every role, from twisted villains to tortured souls. In films like White Zombie, he didn’t just play characters—he embodied the haunting, magnetic energy that defined horror in its golden age. Despite being typecast, Lugosi embraced the shadows. His collaboration with director Ed Wood in his later years, including Plan 9 from Outer Space, helped preserve his legacy as a cult figure in classic horror.


0:00:00  Scared to Death (1947) 
1:07:44  The Corpse Vanishes (1942)
2:10:30  The Death Kiss (1932) 
3:21:16  Plan 9 (1957)
4:38:51  One Body Too Many (1944) 
5:54:22  Ghosts on the Loose (1943)
6:59:03  The Whispering Shadow (1933) 
8:02:10  Black Dragons (1942) 
9:03:59  Bride of the Monster (1955)
10:12:10 White Zombie (1932)


@CultCinemaClassics
